title: I3S Scene Layer: elevationInfo
description: An object defining where a feature is placed within a scene. For example, on the ground or at an absolute height. [See more](https://developers.arcgis.com/web-scene-specification/objects/elevationInfo/) information on elevation in ArcGIS clients.

offset.description: Offset is always added to the result of the above logic except for onTheGround where offset is ignored.

unit.description: A string value indicating the unit for the values in elevationInfo
